reference.shortdesc: Provides the workload status of threads for buckets.

section.title: Description
section.p: This command is used to check how many threads of various types are currently running.

section.title: Options
section.p: The following are the command options:

row.entry: Name of the bucket. If not specified, the default is used.

section.title: Example
section.p: This example shows four reader threads and four writer threads on the default bucket in the cluster at 10.5.2.54:11210. The vBucket map for the data bucket is grouped into multiple vBuckets, where one read worker accesses one of the vBuckets. In this example, there is one reader for each of the four vBuckets.
